name: Peter Jens
goal:
Agent of Change within the sustainable North-West European, Asian and North-African agri-food complex, with focus on organic and otherwise certified agricultural and foodproduction practices.

Establishing and managing strategic alliances between corporations and CSO's, pre-competitive positioning.

Instilling new narratives and paradigms prior to regulatory activities.

Director of Strategic Alliances at Koppert Biological Systems
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Climate Action, Consumer Affairs, Culture, Development, Environment, External Relations, Food Safety, Trade
euInitiatives:
Organic legislation, pesticide regulations, biological agents, biocontrol, biopesticides, biofertilizers, biostimulants &
animal welfare
